title: Heimerdinger, Talon, Mordekaiser Similarities
body: I'm looking for a champion to main. But the problem is I cant decide my playstyle. Personally I think the champions above are the ones I enjoy most, but I'm not sure. I would like some suggestions for similar champions to all these to add to my pool. Thanks.

replies.body: if u like heimer id suggest zyra or karma (plants and upgraded spells respectively) talon maybe like leblanc or maybe ahri  cus like burst assassins and can carry easily if fed and idk about mord cus i dont play him

teemo yorick vlad yi malz 

pretty much all the vermin picks that makes the enemy team spew

Morderkaiser - try Vlad or Yorick.
Heimer - no one is really like heimer.
Talon - try Rengar/Khazix/Fiora/Diana/Fizz/Syndra

> [{quoted}](name=MysticNinja,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jUh7AfnR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-27T08:58:23.004+0000)
>
> why u no repsond?

Zyra-Heim,  Yorick-Mord, -talon-irelia?

try zed. you like op champions, or high damage. 
ahri could be kinda you style maybe.

play leblanc i think you will like her. just farm lvl 1 and do a little harass i like to start q but some starts w then at lvl 2 just do your qw combo go back to farming safely then just rense and repeat till they are low enough to qw ignite. only problem you may have with her is her csing is a little bit harder than talon's but you will get used to it just spend like 20min practicing it in a custom
